text: "Treat You Better" is a 2016 song by Canadian singer Shawn Mendes and is the lead single from his second studio album Illuminate. It topped the single charts in Poland and Slovenia. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Lebanon, Mexico, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, Slovakia, Sweden, the United Kingdom and the United States. == Track listing == == References == Category:2016 songs Category:Shawn Mendes songs
title: Treat You Better
